page.title: 04NEASDEN TUBE DEPOT
page.content: {Neasden}has one of the largest engineering depots on the whole of the {London Underground System. There are 120 people employed on a daily basis,mainly engineering workers. There are also 150 people employed on a shift system.These are mostly cleaners. The depot maintains rolling stock for the{Jubilee}and{Metropolitan}lines. There are 56 Metropolitan and 35 Jubilee trains. 15 of these are brand new and have a computer in them.(These are like black box flight recorders used in aircraft) This allows the engineers to tell when the trains need servicing and also to know exactly what has gone wrong with them. These new trains cost up to{Â£2 million}each.
